Package org.apache.mina.integration.spring

SpringFramework-specific classes for integration

See:
          Description

Class Summary
Binding Defines an address to IoHandler binding.
DatagramAcceptorFactoryBean AbstractIoAcceptorFactoryBean implementation which allows for easy configuration of DatagramAcceptor instances using Spring.
DatagramConnectorFactoryBean AbstractIoConnectorFactoryBean implementation which allows for easy configuration of DatagramConnector instances using Spring.
InetAddressEditor Java Bean PropertyEditor which converts Strings into InetAddress objects.
InetSocketAddressBindingIoAcceptorFactoryBean Common base class for factory beans creating IoAcceptor instances which bind to InetSocketAddress addresses.
IoFilterMapping Associates a name with an IoFilter.
SocketAcceptorFactoryBean AbstractIoAcceptorFactoryBean implementation which allows for easy configuration of SocketAcceptor instances using Spring.
SocketConnectorFactoryBean AbstractIoConnectorFactoryBean implementation which allows for easy configuration of SocketConnector instances using Spring.
VmPipeAcceptorFactoryBean AbstractIoAcceptorFactoryBean implementation which allows for easy configuration of VmPipeAcceptor instances using Spring.
VmPipeConnectorFactoryBean AbstractIoConnectorFactoryBean implementation which allows for easy configuration of VmPipeConnector instances using Spring.
 

Package org.apache.mina.integration.spring Description
